issues.description: The 200 and 300 blocks of Cleveland Ave. have never been resurfaced in the 45 years that we have lived here. This year there are at least 9 potholes in front of my house alone. Furthemore, several years ago we were told the street would be resurfaced. It never happened. We are long overdue for this work to be done.
